alert.note: Alert for Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 4:53AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern West Baton Rouge, southern Pointe Coupee and northwestern Iberville Parishes through 530 AM CDT... At 453 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Krotz Springs, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Livonia, Maringouin, Fordoche, Rosedale, Grosse Tete, Erwinville and Lottie. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 142 and 146. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge
